DOC.brief_summary: It important people stroke exercise order improve overall recovery general health . However , individual less physically active people without stroke , often achieve recommended frequency , intensity duration exercise . Low level physical activity lead people stroke become unfit , result functional decline increase difficulty active . It important determine encourage people stroke active long-term . The transition time end rehabilitation return community might ideal time address barrier , develop positive habit , knowledge ability long-term participation exercise . We develop PROPEL program combine exercise self-management strategy rehabilitation promote physical activity rehabilitation . Preliminary pilot finding indicate people complete PROPEL physically active discharge . This study aim evaluate effect PROPEL long-term participation exercise discharge stroke rehabilitation . This study take place 6 different hospital . Participants either complete control intervention ( group exercise ) PROPEL intervention ( group exercise plus self-management ) . Participants ' adherence exercise 6 month end intervention evaluate use activity heart rate monitor physical activity questionnaire . We expect study show simple intervention deliver rehabilitation increase participation exercise rehabilitation . Increased participation exercise could lead improve stroke recovery overall health , reduce risk another stroke .
DOC.criteria: Individuals refer group aerobic exercise PROPEL program part stroke rehabilitation . Language communication barrier prevents completion questionnaire ( e.g. , severe receptive global aphasia nonEnglish speaking ) ; Cognitive impairment would prevent participation unsupervised exercise ; Attend le 50 % group aerobic exercise/PROPEL session ; and/or Attend less 4 6 group discussion session ( individual refer PROPEL program ) .
